name: Pirate Wars VR (Oculus Go)
description:
Pirate Wars VR introduces you to a new way of managing and controlling a pirate ship all in first person! Take control of your ship in the middle of the endless pirate infested ocean and hunt, destroy or even flee from hostile ships.  Destroy ships and collect the loot for repairs and ship upgrades for speed and damage.

Play in three entire ocean environments to challenge the enemy lurking in the ocean with Day mode, Night mode and Fog mode! Compare and compete against your previous scores with difficulty increasing based on how you progress.
